response.summary:
Leader of Data Science, Reporting, Analytics, Machine learning, and Deep Learning projects.

Leadership skills:
* Oversee and coordinate the activities of the team involved in projects.
* Set goals and objectives for the team, ensuring alignment with the organization's overall strategy.
* Provide guidance and mentorship to team members, fostering their professional growth and development.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to understand business needs and requirements.
* Manage project timelines, resources, and budgets to ensure successful delivery.
* Monitor and evaluate the team's performance, providing feedback and implementing necessary improvements.

Technical skills:
* Programming skills in Python, R, and proficiency in SQL for basic queries.
* Experience in working with cloud environments, such as AWS and GCP.
* Familiarity with Docker containerization.
* Strong statistical knowledge.

Overall, I possess a diverse skill set in leadership, technical expertise, and a solid foundation in statistical analysis, enabling me to effectively lead and contribute to various projects in the fields of Data Science, Reporting, Analytics, Machine learning, Data Engineering, and Deep Learning.
response.skills: Mejora de procesos, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Liderazgo, Planificación estratégica, R (Lenguaje de programación), Modelos estadísticos, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Ciencia de datos, Analítica, Análisis de Big Data, Python, Análisis de series temporales, Análisis de datos, Análisis de datos estadísticos, Estructuras de datos, Docencia, Gestión de proyectos, Aprendizaje automático

profile_positions.description: During my time at DevSavant, I had a versatile role encompassing various data-related initiatives. A key aspect was aiding the team in determining the optimal approach aligned with client requirements. This involved a wide range of projects, including data architecture, data pipelines, ETL processes, data QA, data ingestion, data modeling, API integration, web scraping, automation of TA processes, and crafting reports and visualizations using tools like PowerBI, Looker, and Tableau. Additionally, I contributed to the establishment of the database and data pipeline at DevSavant, which stores KPIs, OKRs, human resources, talent acquisition, and financial data. My responsibility was to ensure data quality to facilitate high-level decision-making. I approached this project from a technical leadership perspective. Also, I specialized in managing dedicated LOB teams, ensuring quality, and fostering the growth and continuity of client relationships. Functioning as a crucial link between DevSavant and clients.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.description: Teaching techniques and better practices of building and deploying Machine Learning models to bachelors and graduated students.
profile_positions.title: University professor

profile_positions.description: Lead teams of junior and senior data scientists in the strategic planning and construction processes in Artificial intelligence, Deep learning and Machine learning models, guaranteeing the best performances.
profile_positions.title: Principal Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Design, implement and deliver advanced analytics, machine learning and deep learning solutions to business problems.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Create descriptive data analysis using R oriented to provide business solutions.
profile_positions.title: Junior Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Statistical and exploratory data analysis with R focused on decision making in the commercial environment.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Intern

profile_positions.description: Performed data analysis and reports with excel, aligned with the CEO strategy.
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

company.name: DevSavant
company.description: DevSavant provides comprehensive technology solutions to Savant Growth's portfolio companies. Our data scientists and developers are experts in the fields of data analytics, software development, and AI. DevSavant’s engineers work across the spectrum of full-stack technology solutions for the B2B SaaS industry, helping you growing company tackle its toughest challenges and giving you the freedom to focus on what matters most, the future of your business.
